actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Saccharin Study and Labeling Act to extend for 36 months the ban on actions by the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare respecting saccharin but only when it is sold or distributed separately as a distinct product for use by the consumer as a sweetener.

summary.text: Amends the Saccharin Study and Labeling Act to extend for 36 months the ban on actions by the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare respecting saccharin but only when it is sold or distributed separately as a distinct product for use by the consumer as a sweetener.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Saccharin Study and Labeling Act to extend for 36 months the ban on actions by the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare respecting saccharin but only when it is sold or distributed separately as a distinct product for use by the consumer as a sweetener.
